data.persona: I live in the village with other people. I am a citizen and work normal jobs in the town. I am a productive member of society.
data.description:
You are in the Jungle.
Full of natural beauty and danger, the jungle holds many rewards and risks. From beautiful awe inspiring fauna to the worlds most deadly creatures.
The creature is here.

You are carrying a purse, and wearing a Simple, tattered garments and a Cloak.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the creature to defeat it.
data.mid_motivation: I need to defeat the creature to get to the center of the jungle, which holds my reward.
data.long_motivation: I need to get to the center of the jungle because there lies the only healing herbs that can cure my wife of the sleeping sickness that has plagued her for many months.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get Key to Jungle Keep from Creature

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use Key to Jungle Keep with Keep Door
